Class Formatting

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpplle.comcode.Formatting

  • public abstract class Formatting
extends java.lang.Object

    A utility class with some functions to provide formatting.

      converts int number to be fit into field to a string then passes onto the pad method if needs left padding, else returns the number as string

      puts a string into a fixed field width
      static java.lang.String fixedField(java.lang.String str, int fieldWidth, boolean padRight)
      pads the field with appropriate amount of ' ' chars to make a well-formatted field
      private static java.lang.String pad(java.lang.String str, int numChars, boolean padRight)
      method to pad a string with spaces on the left
      static java.lang.String padLeft(java.lang.String str, int numChars)
      calls the pad function with boolean padRight == false meaning insert spaces to left
      static java.lang.String padRight(java.lang.String str, int numChars)
      calls the pad function with booolean padRight == true meaning append speces to right

                   int numChars,

        method to pad a string with spaces on the left
        Parameters:
        str -
        numChars -
        padRight - true if pad right method, false for pad left
        Returns:
        a string of ' ' chars appended to the right for padRight, and inserted to the left for padLeft

      • fixedField

        public static java.lang.String fixedField(java.lang.Integer num,
                          int fieldWidth)
        converts an integer object to a int and passes to overloaded fixedField method for padding
        Parameters:
        num - the number to be inserted (passed as Integer so must be int.value to be made into string)
        fieldWidth - the integer width of the text field
        Returns:
        a fixed text field properly formatted with padding left or right
